LicenseDescriptionsForConsumers.All Righ: Simungathe kusintha chinachilichonse kopanda chilolezo chapadera kuchokera kwa eni ake.
LicenseDescriptionsForConsumers.CC BY: Mutha kusintha kapena kugawana kapena kugulitsa ngati mwavomereza poyera kuti wolemba siinu.
LicenseDescriptionsForConsumers.CC BY-NC: Mutha kusintha izi ngati simupangira malonda. Muyenera kunena poyera kuti simunalembe ndinu ndipo msapangire malonda.
Mutha kutenga ndikugawira ena zolembedwazi pokhapokha ngati mwavomereza poyera kuti simunalembe ndinu. Simungathe kuzisintha kapena kuchitira malonda.
Mutha kusinthazolembedwazi ngati simudzipangira malonda koma nenani poyera yemwe analemba.
LicenseDescriptionsForConsumers.CC BY-ND: Mutha kugwiritsa zolembazi ntchito ina, kuphatikizapo zobweretsa ndalama. Koma, simungazisinthe ndipo onetsetsani kuti wolemba mwamutchula.
LicenseDescriptionsForConsumers.CC BY-SA: Chipangizochi mukhoza kuchigwiritsa ntchito mu njira zina, ngakhale za malonda, bola ngati mufotokoze za mwini wake ndi kuyika chiphaso motsatira ndondomeko zimene zilipo kale. Zipangizo zina zonse zatsopano zikhale ndi chiphaso chomwecho.
LicenseDescriptionsForConsumers.Public D: Chipangizochi ndi chaulere. Mukhoza kugawa, kusintha ndi kuwonjezerapo zina kuti muchitire malonda.
LicenseDescriptionsForConsumers.Special: Chipangizochi chimafuna chilolezo chapadera. Funsani kwa wopereka chilolezocho kuti akuuzeni zimene muli ololedwa kuchita.
LicenseDescriptionsForCreators.All Right: Muli ndi ufulu wonse pa chipangizo chanu ndipo aliyense wofuna kugawa, kusintha kapena kuwonjezerapo zinthu zina pa chipangizochi sangatero popanda chilolezo chanu.
LicenseDescriptionsForCreators.CC BY: Chiphaso ichi chimapereka mwayi kwa ena kuti agawe, asinthe komanso awonjezere zina pa chipangizo chanu bola ngati afotokoze kuti ndi inuyo amene mudachipanga. Chiphasochi ndi chopambana ziphaso zina zonse zimene zimapereka chilolezo kwa anthu ena ndipo ndi choyenera nthaqi imene mukufuna kuti anthu ena agwiritse ntchito zipangizo zochuluka mwaulere.
LicenseDescriptionsForCreators.CC BY-NC: Chiphaso ichi chimapereka mwayi kwa ena kuti asinthe komanso awonjezere zinthu zina pa chipangizo chanu koma mosachita malonda. Iwo sakuyenera kulandira chilolezo motsatira ndondomeko zimene zilipo kale ngakhale kuti zipangizo zimene apange iwowo sizikhala za malonda komanso zisonyeze kuti ndi inu mwini wa chipangizocho.
LicenseDescriptionsForCreators.CC BY-NC-: Chiphaso ichi chili ndi ndondomeko zokhwima kwambiri potengera ziphaso zikuluzikulu zisanu ndi chimodzi zimene zimalola anthu kugwiritsa ntchito zinthu mwaulere. Chimangolola kuti anthu atenge chipangizo chanu ndi kugawana ndi anthu ena, koma sangachisinthe mu njira ina iliyonse kapena kuchitira malonda.

Chiphaso ichi chimapereka mwayi kwa ena kuti asinthe komanso awonjezere zinthu zina pa chipangizo chanu koma mosachita malonda, bola ngati afotokoze kuti mwini wake ndi inu komanso ngati ayike chilolezo pa zipangizo zatsopanozo motsatira ndondomeko zofanana ndi zanu.
LicenseDescriptionsForCreators.CC BY-ND: Chiphaso ichi chimapereka mwayi kwa anthu ena kuti agwiritsenso ntchito chipangizo chanu mu njira ina iliyonse, ngakhale kuchitira malonda. Komabe, nkovuta kusintha ndi kugawana chipangizochi ndiponso aliyense akuyenera kufotokoza za inu ngati mwini.
LicenseDescriptionsForCreators.CC BY-SA: Chiphaso ichi chimapereka mwayi kwa ena kuti asinthe komanso awonjezere zinthu zina pa chipangizo chanu, ngakhale kuchitira malonda, bola ngati afotokoze kuti mwini wake ndi inu komanso ngati ayike chilolezo pa zipangizo zatsopanozo motsatira ndondomeko zofanana ndi zanu. Chiphasochi chimafanana ndi njira zopezera uthenga mwaulere zotchedwa "kope lefuti" komanso "openi sosi". Zipangizo zonse zimene zapangidwa potengera chipangizo chanu zikuyenera kukhala ndi chiphaso chomwecho ndipo anthu angathe kuchitira malonda. Wikipedia imagwiritsa ntchito chiphaso chimenechi. Chiphasochi chingagwiritsidwe ntchito ndi zipangizo zokhudzana ndi Wikipedia kapena ntchito zina zofuna chiphaso choterechi.
LicenseDescriptionsForCreators.Public Do: Chipangizo ichi ndi chaulere potengera malamulo oteteza umwini wa zinthu.
LicenseDescriptionsForCreators.Special P: Ichi ndi chiphaso chapadera chimene mungagwiritse ntchito pamene njira zina zakanika. Ndi udindo wanu kufotokozera za chiphasocho ndipo izi muwauzenso amene amagwiritsa ntchito.
LongLicenseNames.CC BY-NC: Creative Commons: kufotokoza za umwini, si za malonda
LongLicenseNames.CC BY-NC-ND: Creative Commons: kufotokoza za umwini, si za malonda, palibe maganizo atsopano
LongLicenseNames.CC BY-NC-SA: Creative Commons: kufotokoza za umwini, si za malonda, zogawa potengera ndondomeko zofanana
LongLicenseNames.CC BY-ND: Creative Commons: kufotokoza za umwini, palibe maganizo atsopano
LongLicenseNames.CC BY-SA: Creative Commons: kufotokoza za umwini, zogawa potengera ndondomeko zofanana

PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriAboutP1: Omwe anapanga pulogalamu ya Kolibri ndi a Foundation for Learning Equality, Inc. Kuti mudziwe zambiri, kuphatikiza Zokhudza Kusunga Chinsinsi pa Kolibri, pitani pa:
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriAboutP2: Mungathe kuika pulogalamu ya Kolibri pa zipangizo zosiyanasiyana n'kumaigwiritsa ntchito popanda intaneti.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriAboutP3: Mosiyana ndi malo ambiri a pa intaneti omwe mungathe kuwatsekula kudzera mu bulawuza, pali zipangizo zambiri pa dziko lonse kuphatikizapo chipangizo chino, zomwe anaikapo pulogalamu ya Kolibri. Pulogalamu iliyonse ya Kolibri imene yayikidwa pa chipangizo imayang'aniridwa ndi mwiniwake wa chipangizocho.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriAboutP4: Nzotheka kuti oyang'anira Kolibri asakanize zopezeka pa Kolibri ndi madera ena a ntchito za Kolibri. Zikatere, zonse zopezeka pa Kolibri zidzionedwa ndi oyendetsa ntchito za magawo enawo a Kolibri. Zinthuzo zidziikidwa mmagawo oyendetsedwa ndi a Learning Equality omwe adzithanso kuona zonsezi.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriAboutP5: Popititsa patsogolo ntchito za Kolibri ndi a Learning Equality adziunjika zonse ndikuonetsetsa kuti maina a anthu ogwiritsa ntchito sakuoneka Kolibri akalumikizidwa ku intaneti. Zina mwa zomwe zidzibisidwa ndi keyala ya "IP adress," zokhudza kompyuta yomwe ikugwiritsidwa ntchito komanso nthawi. Zinanso zomwe zidzitengedwa ndi kuchuluka kwa ogwiritsa ntchito, zaka zakubadwa, ngati ogwiritsa ntchito ndi makazi kapana mwamuna, komanso kutchuka kwa zinthu zowerenga. Timayesetsa kuti tisatenge zokhudza ogwiritsa ntchito Kolibri.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriOwnersP1: Muzigwiritsa ntchito Kolibri mogwirizana ndi malamulo onse. Ngati ndinu mwini wa chipangizo chimene pulogalamuyi yayikidwa, dziwani kuti inuyo ndi amene muli ndi udindo woteteza zinthu za amene akugwiritsa ntchito pulogalamuyi zimene zasungidwa pa Kolibri.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriOwnersP2: Muziyesetsanso kutsatira malangizo onse okhudza kuteteza zinthu zanu zachinsinsi. Zimenezi ndi monga kuteteza chipangizo chanu, kuteteza "hard drive" yanu ndi manambala komanso zilembo, kugwiritsa ntchito manambala achinsinsi, kupanga apudeti pafupipafupi pulogalamu ya kompyuta yanu komanso kuonetsetsa kuti zinthu zonse zoteteza kompyuta yanu zili bwino.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriOwnersP3: Mukasankha kuti uthenga wanu uziwoneka mogwirizana ndi malo a uthenga a Kolibri, zikutanthauza kuti mukupereka chilolezo kwa oyang'anira ntchito za Kolibri kuti apeze uthenga wanuwo. Pameneponso ndiye kuti mukupereka chilolezo ku bungwe la "Learning Equality" limene limayendetsa ntchito zokhudza ma "seva".
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriOwnersP4: Chonde onetsetsani kuti pali njira yoti anthu amene akugwiritsa ntchito pulogalamuyi pa chipangizo chanu azitha kukupezani mosavuta ngati ali ndi dandaulo lokhudza akaunti yawo.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriUsersL1: Kupatsa ena nambala yanu yachinsinsi, kulola kuti anthu azilowa pa akaunti yanu kapena kuchita zinthu zimene zingayike akauntiyo pachiopsezo
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriUsersL2: Kulowa pa akaunti ya munthu wina
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriUsersL3: Kuchotsa, kusintha, kuyimitsa, kuononga kapena kuchita zilizonse zimene zingasokoneze zinthu zokhudza chitetezo cha pa Kolibri
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriUsersL4: Kusintha kapena kusokoneza mwadala kagwiridwe ntchito ka Kolibri kapena kuchititsa kuti anthu ena azivutika pogwiritsa ntchito pulogalamuyi
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriUsersP1: Gwiritsani ntchito Kolibri motsatira malamulo onse. Izi zikutanthauza kutenga chilolezo kwa mokolo anu, amene akukusungani kapena aphunzitsi anu.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriUsersP2: Dziwani kuti mukamagwiritsa ntchito Kolibri, anthu ena angathe kuona zinthu zonse zokhudza inuyo, mogwirizana ndi mmene pulogalamuyi yaikidwira komanso mmene mumaigwiritsira ntchito.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriUsersP3: Chonde funsani adiminisitileta wanu wa Kolibri kuti mudziwe za zinthu zokhudza inuyo zimene zasungidwa, amene angathe kuziona, zimene mungachite kuti mukonze kapena kuchotsa zinthuzo kapenanso ngati mukukayikira kuti anthu ena akugwiritsa ntchito akaunti yanu popanda chilolezo.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriUsersP5: Mukalowa ndikuyamba kugwiritsa ntchito Kolibri, zinthu ngati dzina lanu, chizindikiro chanu, zaka zakubadwa, nambala ya chiphatso chanu, zinthu zomwe mumazigwiritsa ntchito, komanso m'mene mukukhozera zitha kuoneka ndi oyendetsa Kolibri. Eni ake a Kolibri atha kuzigwiritsa ntchito ndikugawira omwe amapanga ntchito za pa Kolibri ncholinga choti athe kupeza njira zopititsira patsogolo ntchito za Kolibri komanso kuthandiza ogwiritsa ntchito ena.
PrivacyInfoModal.kolibriUsersP6: Mukamagwiritsa ntchito Kolibri ngati mlendo, oyendetsa ntchito za Kolibri komanso aphunzitsi atha kuona zomwe mumakonda kugwiritsa ntchito pa Kolibri.
PrivacyInfoModal.openIdH1: Kulowa mu Kolibri pogwiritsa ntchito makina kapena ma pologalamu ena
PrivacyInfoModal.openIdP1: Nkotheka kugwiritsa ntchito Kolibri kuti muloere ma pologalamu ena. mukatere, pologalamu inayo itha kumaona zokhudza inu pa Kolibri.
RegisterFacilityModal.enterToken: Lowetsani chizindikiro cha ntchito yanu kuchokera ku tsamba la Kolibri
ReportErrorModal.emailDescription: Dziwitsani gulu lopereka thandizo za vuto lanu ndipo tiyesetsa m'mene tingathere kuti tikuthandizeni.
ReportErrorModal.emailPrompt: Tumizani uthenga wa imelo kwa opanga pulogalamu
ReportErrorModal.forumPostingTips: Phatikizani mwachidule zimene munachita komanso pamene munasindikiza kuti vutolo libwere.
ReportErrorModal.forumUseTips: Fufuzani pa malo okambirana zinthu kuti mudziwe ngati enanso akumanapo ndi vuto limeneli. Ngati simunapeze yankho, ikani m'munsimu zimene munakopera zokhudza vutolo kuti tifufuze njira yothetsera vutoli mu pulogalamu ya Kolibri yam'tsogolo.
SelectAddressForm.fetchingFailedText: Chinachake chalakwika pofufuza ma adiresi omwe alipo
SkipNavigationLink.skipToMainContentActi: Dutsani zinazi ndikupita pa tsamba la ntchito yeni yeni
UpdateNotification.upgradeMessage0130: Kolibro 0.13.0 akupezeka tsopano. Kolibri ameneyu ndiwapamwamba ndipo mutha kugwritisa ntchito zambiri.
UpdateNotification.upgradeMessageImporta: Tatulutsa Kolibri watsopano komanso takonza mavuto ena mu Kolibri wapanoyu.
